name: Kunna Masala Recipe | Gulzar Hussain | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Kunna Masala Recipe: Black cumin 6 tbsp Nutmeg 1 tbsp Whole coriander 8 tbsp Whole black pepper 2 tbsp Star anise 2 Cloves 1 tbsp Small cardamom 1 tbsp
instructions: On a flat pan add 6 tbsp black cumin, 1 tbsp nut meg Add 8 tbsp whole coriander, 2 tbsp whole black pepper Add 2 star anise, 1 tbsp clove and 1 tbsp small cardamom to suate. Then grind them in a grinder.
